name: Flower Gift
summary: Raises all party Pokémon's Attack and Special Defense stats by 50% in the sun. Cherrim also changes forms, from Overcoat to Sunshine.
viability: In singles, this is useless, as Grass-moves are better specially than physically, such as Solar Beam. In Doubles and Triple, though, this is an entirely different story. Especially if you have a Pokémon with good physical attack like Shiftry, with Chlorophyll, Flower Gift becomes an absolute must-have.
